title: Mer, I Love You - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Doctors   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Music   Oneshot   Scientists
author: Akira Ninomae   にのまえ あきら
description:
“Hello there, are you awake?”

When the girl woke up, she was in a strange room with a person she didn’t know.

She doesn’t remember anything, not even her name, but the stranger says to the girl….

“It’s nice to meet you, Mer Ivy.”

This is the story of a girl and a doctor who never speaks his name.

And the story that follows.

Please read it again at least once to see if you can understand the meaning of the girl’s name.>
